Name: The Addington
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A beautifully balanced, spirit-forward, stirred, cognac-based cocktail with Vermouth di Torino and herbal liqueur.
History: Created in 2015 by Guy Butler at Muddlers in Sydenham, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of The Addington contains 169 calories
